title: How to Make Egg Bhurji (Scrambled Eggs Indian Style)

steps.headline: Break and beat eggs and keep them aside.
steps.description: You may add salt to the egg if you so desire.

steps.headline: Heat oil in a wok, add the zeera.
Once the zeera sparkles, add the turmeric, ginger garlic paste and the onions.
Sauté the onions till they are a light brown.
Add the tomatoes, the salt and red chilli powder.
Once the tomatoes are cooked (they should be completely mashed), add the eggs.
The egg will get scrambled and absorb the flavour of the gravy.
steps.description: Cook the eggs till the gravy gets dry.

text: Break and beat eggs and keep them aside. You may add salt to the egg if you so desire. Heat oil in a wok, add the zeera.  Once the zeera sparkles, add the turmeric, ginger garlic paste and the onions.  Sauté the onions till they are a light brown.  Add the tomatoes, the salt and red chilli powder.  Once the tomatoes are cooked (they should be completely mashed), add the eggs. Stir vigorously and continuously. The egg will get scrambled and absorb the flavour of the gravy. Cook the eggs till the gravy gets dry. Your Egg Bhurji is ready.
